text: Irene Frances Luther (aka Irene Rich; October 13, 1891 â€“ April 22, 1988) was an American movie actress who also worked in radio. She played Stephanie in A Law Unto Herself. She also played Marga in Her Purchase Price. Rich was born in Buffalo, New York. She died in the Hope Ranch district of Santa Barbara, California of heart failure. Rich was 96. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American radio actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:1891 births Category:1988 deaths
title: Irene Rich
